name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Today is Pancake Day, the day that we remember and pay tribute to all of the pancakes that have died in my stomach.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: I have learned a lot from the Olympics. Mostly that I miss football.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The head of Toyota had to appear before Congress to be yelled at. It was actually refreshing to see a car company CEO appear before Congress and not ask for $10 billion.
